title: How does this make sense?
content:
https://preview.redd.it/xr99wvu7yume1.png?width=1600&format=png&auto=webp&s=0eb34e737600b5372183ee73b354034c3bd4ccc5

so you're telling me, if I register for admission from your own website and get a seat, I've to pay you 4 times the KCET fee for no reason? or is their cutoff lower than the usual KCET cutoff?

comments.body: the cutoff is lower than kcet cutoff, people who got decent kcet rank but not enough to join pes can pay more fees to get seat using kcet rank

The cutoff will be lower 
It's like separate councelling but based on kcet ranks
is there any approximate cutoff for cse?
is there any approximate cutoff for cse?
nobody knows as this is the first year
They kept this for the first time nobody knows it
